span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;

    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;
    background-color: #061b30;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.pkg-exc ul li {

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Krabi Bangkok Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/thailand-tour-packages" title="Thailand Tour Packages">Thailand</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Krabi Bangkok Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c33880c7b22_94128728" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/krabi-tour.jpg" alt="Krabi Bangkok Tour Package" title="Krabi Bangkok Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Namaste India Trip presents you with a fun opportunity to explore the beautiful Thai town of Krabi with the carefully curated and hassle-free Krabi Bangkok Tour Package. Discover the hidden gems of Thailand and be a part of an unforgettable experience with numerous whimsical tourist attractions and a coastline which spells relaxation. This place is quickly becoming a tourist hub for people from all over the world seeking peace and looking to quench their wanderlust.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Krabi Bangkok Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Krabi</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Upon your arrival in Krabi you will be escorted by our tour representative to your allotted hotel where you will be staying the night. The rest of the day is free for you to perform your leisurely activities and get ready for the next day of exciting exploration.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Krabi (4 Islands Hopping Tour)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having your breakfast you will be made to head out for a fun-filled day of 4 islands hopping. You will be taken across the following 4 islands: Chicken Island – which is named so because of its odd rock formations which resembles a chicken; Koh Poda Island – which is a beautiful island amidst the clear blue sea; Tup Island – one of the most popular off shore islands famed for being a part of islands hopping where you can go for snorkeling and relaxing by the glimmering water; Phra Nang Island – which is home to caves consisting of stalagmite formations and is known for the presence of a snake shrine.</p>
<p>After a relaxing and beautiful island hopping trip you will be made to head back to your allotted hotel in Krabi where you will be spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Krabi – Bangkok</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having your breakfast in the morning you will be checked out of your hotel and transferred to the airport. You will be made to board the flight headed towards Bangkok where upon arrival our tour representative will transfer you to our hotel allotted here. The remaining day will be free for you to do your leisurely activities.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Bangkok</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having a wholesome breakfast in the morning you will be assisted for a complete sightseeing tour of the city. You will be taken to Wat Traimit – which is home to the solid gold sitting Buddha statue which weighs 5.5 tons; Wat Pho – the reclining Buddha statue and also one of the oldest temples in Bangkok. The remainder of the day is free for you to explore this unique city on your own. You can shop for memorable souvenirs like, Thai silk, Thai spices, Thai handicrafts, Thai snacks and so much more. You also have the option of indulging in some delicious food items like, pad Thai, Tom yum goong soup, Som Tum soup, Gaeng Daeng, Khao Pad and a whole plethora of other cuisines.</p>
<p>You will finally be made to head back to your hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Bangkok Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having a wholesome breakfast meal you will be transferred to the airport where you will be boarded to your flight heading to your onward destination.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="cmsmasters-icon-flight" aria-hidden="true"></i> Trip Highlights</h3>
<ul class="highlight-this-tour">
<li>Tour to the 4 islands namely the Chicken Island, Koh Poda Island, Tup Island and Phra Nang Island</li>
<li>Visit the famous caves consisting of stalagmite formations and is known for the presence of a snake shrine at Phra Nang Island</li>
<li>Visit to Wat Traimit the home of the solid gold sitting Buddha statue which weighs 5.5 tons</li>
<li>Also see the Wat Pho - the reclining Buddha statue</li>
<li>Do some good shopping of Thai silk, Thai spices, Thai handicrafts and mouth watering Thai snacks</li>
<li>Try the local delicacies like pad Thai, Tom Yum Goong Soup, Som Tum Soup, Gaeng Daeng, Khao Pad</li>
</ul></div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Krabi Bangkok Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Draws People To Krabi?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Krabi is well-known for its scenic views and beautiful beaches and islands. Its coral reef vistas are also among the most beautiful in the world, making the City an excellent location for coral diving.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Month Is Best For Visiting Krabi, Thailand?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Krabi is best visited between November and March, which is also the peak tourist season. Krabi experiences heavy rainfall from June to October, so it is not overrun with tourists.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Makes Bangkok So Unique?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> For decades, Bangkok has drawn millions of visitors each year, offering tourists an incredible mix of cultural tradition and modernity. It has world-class cuisine, stunning historical landmarks, and some of the best hospitality in the world.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Bangkok Well-Known For In India?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Thai massage is the most well-known feature of Bangkok. Bangkok is the birthplace of Thai massage. You can restore the flexibility of your body muscles by taking pleasure in this message.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Culture Is There In Krabi, Thailand?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Thai culture is predominantly Indian, though many Krabi residents are descended from Chinese immigrants. While Buddhism dominates much of Thai culture, Krabi is an eclectic mix of Muslim, Buddhist, and Chinese-Thai influences, as well as a small number of gipsies.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Krabi Bangkok Tour Package Home » International » Thailand » Krabi Bangkok Tour Package Tour Overview Namaste India Trip presents you with a fun opportunity to explore the beautiful Thai town of Krabi with the carefully curated and hassle-free Krabi Bangkok Tour Package. Discover the hidden gems of Thailand and be a part of an...
